title: Buttermilk Pancakes
ingredients: 2 tbs melted unsalted butter, plus some for frying
instructions: In a large bowl sift together the flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
Beat the eggs with the buttermilk and melted butter.
Combine the dry and the wet ingredients into a lumpy batter, being careful not to over mix.
Stir frozen blueberries into the batter, or sprinkle fresh blueberries into cakes on the griddle.
Spoon 1/3 cup of batter onto the griddle, cooking 2-3 minutes per side.
